channel.title: Npc chating question (not above heads)

item.title: Npc chating question (not above heads)
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

how would i get my own player head to be viewed when you talk to a npc?

heres a example method that i have atm

public void charoneline(String line1) { sendFrame200(969, 591); sendFrame126(playerName, 970); sendFrame126("" + line1 + "", 971); sendFrame164(968); sendFrame75([b]pCHead[/b], 969); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

that should do it but it doesnt? (bolded)
any ideas?

Read full topic
